ValidationRule.description: Validation rule prior to under investigation and closed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR ( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Incident_Status__c),'Under Investigation'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Incident_Status__c),'Suspension' ), ISPICKVAL(Incident_Status__c, 'Closed') ), OR ( ISBLANK(TEXT( Likelihood__c )), ISBLANK(TEXT( Risk_Rank__c )), ISBLANK(TEXT( primary_cause__c )) , ISBLANK(TEXT( Secondary_Cause__c )), ISBLANK( Initial_description__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Initial description, likelihood, severity, primary cause and secondary cause can not be blank
